components.description: Analyze change and continuity within a historical time period.
Assess how historical events and developments were shaped by unique circumstances of time and place as well as broader historical contexts.
Design questions generated about individuals and groups that assess how the significance of their actions changes over time.

standards.title: Understands and analyzes causal factors that have shaped major events in history.

components.description: Analyze how individuals and movements have shaped world history (1450-present).
Summarize how cultures and cultural and ethnic groups have shaped world history (1450-present).
Define and evaluate how technology and ideas have shaped world history (1450-present).
Analyze multiple and complex causes and effects of events in world history (1450-present).

standards.title: Understands that there are multiple perspectives and interpretations of historical events.

components.description: Analyze and interpret historical materials from a variety of perspectives in world history (1450-present).
Analyze the multiple causal factors of conflicts in world history (1450-present) to create and support claims and counterclaims.
Explain how the perspectives of people in the present shape interpretations of the past.

standards.title: Understands how historical events inform analysis of contemporary issues and events.

components.description: Examine and assess how an understanding of world history can explain that earlier events may cause later ones.
